description: Retrieves information about a specified data processing job. See The dataprocessing command. When invoking this operation in a Neptune cluster that has IAM authentication enabled, the IAM user or role making the request must have a policy attached that allows the neptune-db:neptune-db:GetMLDataProcessingJobStatus IAM action in that cluster.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the data-processing job to be retrieved.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: Status of the data processing job.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of this data-processing job.

nested_items.name: processingJob
nested_items.description: Definition of the data processing job.

nested_items.name: failureReason
nested_items.description: The failure reason, in case of a failure.

nested_items.name: cloudwatchLogUrl
nested_items.description: The CloudWatch log URL for the resource.
